content: this free crochet pattern for a 12 granny square is perfect on its own or paired with other blocks in a full afghan inspired by vintage ceramic tiles this feminine afghan block uses aran weight yarn to make a cozy squishy texture >this pattern is available for free on my website here 1 if you prefer a pdf is also available for purchase 1 https //makeitcrochet com/blueberry-pie-12-granny-square-free-crochet-pattern/
